sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_metadata_link"><sys_metadata_link action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><directory>update</directory><documentkey>054f9f9cdba03c100e9c71f239961927</documentkey><payload><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_stave_sc_form_header_action">
    <x_stave_sc_form_header_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <condition_script><![CDATA[/*
Condition script is the script that controls if the action should be displayed or not. 
    Set answer = true to display the action, answer = false to disclude the action. 

    Avaliable variables: 
        current = GlideRecord object of the current record 
        page = the current page
        view = the current view
*/
answer=new x_stave_sc.PurchaseRequest(current).showReceive();]]></condition_script>
        <execution_script><![CDATA[/*
Execution script is the script that is run when executing the action.
    For redirect set the variables:
        answer = {};
        answer.page =  the page param for the URL
        answer.table =  the table param for the URL
        answer.sys_id = the sys id param for the URL
        answer.refVal = the referringValue for the URL, this should typically be set to the display value of the current record;
        answer.redirect = true;
         An example for showing a widget 
         answer = {};
         answer.widget_options={}; 
         answer.widget = true;
         answer.widget_id='stv-sc-receiving-order';
         answer.widget_options.sys_id= current.sys_id.toString();
         answer.widget_options.field_list = "product_name,quantity,received_quantity";

For any other actions the answer variable does not need to be set.

    Avaliable variables: 
        current = GlideRecord object of the current record 
        page = the current page 
        view = the current view
*/
var poId = new x_stave_sc.PurchaseRequest(current).getPurchaseOrderId();
answer = {};
answer.widget_options={};
answer.widget = true;
answer.widget_id='stv-sc-receiving-order';
answer.widget_options.sys_id= poId;
answer.widget_options.title =  "Receive Item";
answer.widget_options.field_list = "product_name,quantity,received_quantity,remaining_quantity";]]></execution_script>
        <icon/>
        <name>Confirm Receipt</name>
        <order>0</order>
        <req_confirm>false</req_confirm>
        <req_refresh>false</req_refresh>
        <sys_created_by>jason.garcia</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-06-01 06:58:08</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>054f9f9cdba03c100e9c71f239961927</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_updated_by>jason.garcia</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-06-01 06:58:08</sys_updated_on>
        <table display_value="Request" name="x_stave_sc_request">ab34ec5ddb236050f24c5e25ca961961</table>
        <workflow_action>false</workflow_action>
    </x_stave_sc_form_header_action>
</record_update>
